data.description:
Liftoff®: XR strives to bring the thrill of drone flying to VR enthusiasts with a tailored experience for Meta Quest hardware. Featuring a user-friendly augmented reality interface and optimized flight dynamics for seamless control with VR Controllers, we promise an accessible experience for those new to the hobby.

- Pilot a virtual drone anywhere you are!
- Experience the most immersive virtual Line Of Sight experience on the market.
- Enter the virtual realm through the portal and experience FPV flight.
- Simple controls - only VR input devices needed.
- Instantly select and fly a collection of micro drones.
- Spawn virtual objects and targets to practise with.
- Listen to your favourite Liftoff: FPV Drone Racing and Liftoff: Micro Drones soundtracks while flying.

changelog.change_log:
Over the past two weeks, thousands of Meta Quest users have experienced the thrill of drone flight and have shared not only their excitement but also valuable feedback. This update addresses some of their suggestions and improves several aspects of the experience.

Version 0.2 changelist:

* Shadow range has been increased to 4m.
* Takeoff speed has been increased.
* Maximum flying altitude has been increased.
* Improved startup flow when there is no space setup available.
* Fixed a bug that prevented the game from unpausing when the headset is taken off and put back on again.
* Added a small deadzone for the yaw axis.
* Fixed an issue with the reflection probe.
* Louder sound of the balloon popping.
